column3: Latest;Stung Treng:------ At 6:30 pm on February 4
column5: fishermen spotted a body floating in the river in Sesan district.------According to the source
column6: the body was male and between 20 to 30 years old and 1.65 meters tall.------ According to a police officer
column7: the dead man had been beaten and tied up. An effort had been made to keep the corpse under water
column8: as it was weighed down with large stones.------Presently
column9: the body was handed over to village authorities. The case has similarities with another in ------Tbong Khmom------ last year.------Rasmei News
